heading: building our village in the city
intro: fractalgva is a neighborhood project in geneva's eaux-vives. the idea: create density of interesting people and serendipitously generate scenius. friends move closer, events self-organize, and the city starts to feel like a durable home base.
detail: previously, i rebuilt ea switzerland from 2016–2019—dropped out of university to do it. the pattern is the same: find the ambitious weirdos, give them infrastructure, watch what happens.

programs.title: fractal university
programs.desc: peer-taught courses on things we care about—claude code, twitter strategy, civilization infrastructure. by far the biggest impact on our community life.

programs.title: fractal accelerator
programs.desc: intensive neighborhood-building program. ran in summer 2025 and led to a significant increase in people around us organizing their own activities.

programs.title: weekly events
programs.desc: open meetups, themed dinners, writing sundays, massage workshops, retro retreats. at least one every week, year-round.

programs.title: castle weekends
programs.desc: annual gathering of friends in a swiss castle. talks, adventures, and the kind of conversations that only happen when you take people out of their routines.

extra_detail: over the years this has also produced: ea workshops, a brocher workshop, themed meetups, groups (civilization servants, the guild, chirad, co-ceos), and a few organizations.
